item.title: Bentoism
item.description: What is Bentoism? see for yourself! A multi-dimensional way of framing what you want x-axis is time: from now -> the future y-axis interest: from self interest -> collective interest A tool for making decisions aligned with our values and goals.

item.title: Birth of this Microblog
item.description: Dunno what I’m doing but this is cool :) and makes me very happy! Took me way too long to realize the reason this wasn’t working was because I don’t know how to read instructions lol.

item.title: feeling comfortable in my own shoes
item.description: Be who you are and say what you feel, because those who mind don’t matter, and those who matter don’t mind.

item.title: Focus & Hell Yeah or No
item.description: Focus Being in the zone—aka being in a [[Quotes#Flow by Mihaly Csikszentmihalyi|flow state]]—is arguably one of the most awesome, fulfilling feelings out there.

item.title: Reading is pretty darn cool
item.description: Reading This story probably sounds familiar to many people. I used to love books as a kid—Goosebumps, the Percy Jackson series, you name it—I could read for hours on end without needing a break.

item.title: Serendipity, file management, health
item.description: Serendipity and math $Luck = f(A, E) = f(D, S, E)$ Luck is a function of $A$ - Surface Area.

item.title: Statistics & personal projects
item.description: Statistics Fun. It’s everywhere. [[Images/Beautiful visualizations.png |Beautiful visualizations]] spark joy. ![[Images/Beautiful visualizations.png]] Personal Projects A [[Journal/07-2023/Birth of this Microblog#Recent Observation|recent observation]] of the kinds of personal projects I pursue has prompted me to ask myself this question:

item.title: What does success mean to you?
item.description: To my future self, I hope you’re healthy, both physically and mentally. Seriously, health is the number one priority. Lift weights and do some form of cardio, no matter how old you may be.
